DOC.brief_summary: We will conduct this study to show that it is possible to ventilate effectively through a Frova bougie and an Ambu® bag.
DOC.detailed_description: We will conduct this interventional study and ask you to squeeze an Ambu® bag connected it to the Frova bougie and will show effective ventilation through it.
DOC.criteria: staff, fellows and resident anesthesiologists injury to hand
